api_list.name: Get Specific Shoe
api_list.description: this will return a specific shoe by their slug , eg:/shoes/air-jordan-6-retro
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://jordan-shoes.p.rapidapi.com/shoes/air-jordan-6-retro"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jordan-shoes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://jordan-shoes.p.rapidapi.com/shoes/{slug}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jordan-shoes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Shoes by query
api_list.description: find shoes with their name eg: /shoes?query=a , it will return all the shoes includes a in their name

api_list.name: Get all the shoes
api_list.code:

url = "https://jordan-shoes.p.rapidapi.com/shoes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jordan-shoes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
